p: The selected CMs were then bias-adjusted and downscaled to the required resolution using Distribution Based Scaling (DBS) (Yang et al. 2010). Here, we applied DBS to daily precipitation and temperature using Watch ERA-Interim Forcing Data (WFDEI, Weedon et al. 2011) as a reference dataset.
